items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress
items.body: I was soooo disappointed I ordered a medium. I usually wear a small, but since it was a sweater type dress, I ordered a medium considering it may run small and I didn’t want it tight. It’s a beautiful Christmas sweater dress. * Except -The sleeves were like million miles long. They actually passed my hands. And you can’t pull it up because they have a puffy ends The dress itself is very soft and cuddly. I think it would look really nice on a tall, slender person not a small short lady. Thank you Read more
items.author: Happy shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: I love this sweater dress! It looks as pictured and it is thick! This sweater will keep you warm and I have gotten lots of compliments on it. It looks as pictured and the colors are vibrant. It's soft and comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Arika Hefner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: I'm fairly short-waisted, so this dress hit abov my waist. I don't have a copious front porch, so that actually suited me quite a bit. If you're larger busted or have a long torso, the lines of this dress may not suit your body shape. As it was, I wore it with bright holiday leggings and got tons of compliments. I definitely treated it more like a tunic than a dress, especially for work, as the skirt is a bit shorter than I'm comfortable wearing in a professional setting. The sleeves are a little odd--they're belled but come to a cuff and didn't blouse quite the way they were shown in the photo. I'm not sure even now if I like them, but that may not be a deal breaker. The yarn was super-soft and would have been comfy even if I hadn't worn a soft tee underneath. The knit did catch and pull fairly easily, but it was repairable with a crochet hook, so no big deal. All together, I'm happy with this new addition to my holiday wardrobe. However, some of the details might not add up to a perfect fit for you. Read more
items.author: Leah L Leibacher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute holiday season sweater dress!!
items.body: This sweater dress is so adorable!! Puffs at the ends of the sleeves are a little strange but the dress as a whole is so cute that it's easy to overlook and embrace the style. Material is soft and reasonably thick. Cable-knit is well made and the reindeer on the skirt are super cute!! Fit is slightly larger than expected, I think the size guide might need a slight adjustment in the measurements provided. Still very flattering dress for the holiday season! Perfect to wear with leggings or fleece tights to work, school, or a holiday party! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its ok but it is soft!
items.body: I'm not sure how I feel about this dress, it puffs out at the hips and sits high so it really accents my hips. It's nice and thick material though, would keep you warm. The sleeves also puff out at the hand, I haven't seen that before except in little kid dresses. It sits above the knee so kind of modest as it doesn't show any cleavage. It's comfortable to wear, not itchy, it's soft. Read more
items.author: NicFred

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars such a cute holiday sweater dress!
items.body: this is just adorable! My bust is 38, my waist 31, and my hips are 42 inches so I got the XL and it fits well. I could have went down a size if I wanted a more tight look but I am all about comfort. The yarn is very soft and not itchy and I just love the detail on the sleeves and skirt! It hits right above my knees and I am 5ft 5 inches Read more
items.author: J. Carrell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful warm knit dress
items.body: A beautiful warm knit dress, I like this dress however I think the wearer needs to be a slim petite figured woman. The skirt is fairly short with a small waist so if you have a little larger tummy or a taller frame this in my opinion is not a dress for you. I am 5’ 7” with a little older woman’s figure so I don’t think this is a dress for me. I like the warmth of this knit dress I just don’t like the fit on me. I docked it one star for that reason. I believe it would look beautiful on a woman with the right frame just not me. I think the dress is made from good quality materials and pretty nicely made for the price. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
